artist: Artist: Taguchi Beisaku; Publisher: Inoue Kichijirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; image of celebration after a battle on a stone walled fortress; two large ships on left, with tiny boats pulling into shore rowing into shore; two soldiers in black uniforms standing on a wall with arms raised in a celebratory manner; round tower on left with more celebrating soldiers standing at top of tower; dead figures on right in colorful clothing
inscription: on left sheet, on back, in LLQ, in pencil: T.71c | on center sheet, on back, in LLQ, in pencil: T.71b | on right sheet, in ULC, in pencil: T71 | on right sheet, in LLC, in pencil: 71 | on right sheet, on back, in LLC, in pencil: T71 a
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of the Occupation of Lüshun Port
